credit_line: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
title: Noh robe
medium:
Medium: silk, gilded paper
Technique: twill weave with supplementary weft
description: Theatrical robe of terracotta silk twill brocaded heavily in polychrome silks and gilded paper. Design of chrysanthemums and five-petal flowers. Lined with solid terracotta silk.
name: Noh robe
